1.0.name: wordpress/ps-tools
1.0.description:
By using PS Tools, you will not need to write up the same reference everytime, what is very boring and time consuming, you just need to select the tool and insert in your text. Also, if you deactivate the plugin, all images will show up, as long as you keep the plugin folder. PS Tools do insert image and text in your content, no shortcodes!

Available languages: *us-US (default) *pt-BR
